snippet: Gunmen killed 44 worshipers in a mosque in northeastern Nigeria on Sunday, a day after 12 people were shot dead in a village nearby, officials said.
abstract: Gunmen kill 44 worshipers in mosque in northeastern Nigeria, day after 12 people are shot dead in village nearby; attacks are believed to be acts of vengeance against citizens who cooperated with military campaign against Islamist extremist group Boko Haram.
lead_paragraph: Gunmen killed 44 worshipers in a mosque in northeastern Nigeria on Sunday, a day after 12 people were shot dead in a village nearby, officials said.
